short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes your currently highlighted text and opens the most relevant Wikipedia article in a pop out window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that takes the user's currently selected text and looks it up in Wikipedia. A lite version of the wikipedia page is rendered in a pop out window.
